title: XSS https://delivery.shopifyapps.com/  (Digital Downloads App  in myshopify.com)

profile.name: Shopify
profile.about: Shopify is a multi-channel commerce platform that helps people sell online, in-store, and everywhere in between.

vulnerability_information: Hello Installing the Digital Downloads App in *.myshopify.com 1-install the app https://apps.shopify.com/digital-downloads 2-select product and click Add Digital Attachment 3-click to upload file and upload file with name Success: tested in firefox Hadji Samir
vulnerability_information_html:
Hello
Installing the Digital Downloads App in *.myshopify.com
1-install the app https://apps.shopify.com/digital-downloads
2-select product and click Add Digital Attachment
3-click to upload file and upload file with name <svg onload=alert(1)>
the code <svg onload=alert(1)> will execute XSS

<span class="file-name"><strong>Success:</strong> <svg onload="alert(1)"/></span>

tested in firefox

Hadji Samir

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Our team is busy triaging and fixing HackerOne reports, and it may take us **up to 3 weeks or more** to triage any given issue. Don't worry, we'll get to yours!

While you are waiting, you can read over our list of non applicable issues listed on our program page: https://hackerone.com/shopify. Make sure your issue isn't listed!

activities.message: Thank you for your report. Our engineering team is investigating the issue.
activities.markdown_message: Thank you for your report. Our engineering team is investigating the issue.

activities.message: The bug is fixed, Great work
As you noticed, we recently fixed the bug. Please note that it may be a couple weeks before our next batch of bounty payments is processed. We will leave this report open until then.
activities.markdown_message: As you noticed, we recently fixed the bug. Please note that it may be a couple weeks before our next batch of bounty payments is processed. We will leave this report open until then.

activities.message: Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify. This issue has been resolved.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify. This issue has been resolved.

activities.message:
I see you published this [on full disclosure](http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2015/Sep/45).

Just for the record, this is not a "Persistent Vulnerability" as you put it, it's a reflected xss that occurs in a message in response to the file upload action. In other words, this is a Self-XSS.
activities.markdown_message:
I see you published this on full disclosure.

Just for the record, this is not a "Persistent Vulnerability" as you put it, it's a reflected xss that occurs in a message in response to the file upload action. In other words, this is a Self-XSS.
